channel.title: Key on Data and Open Source
channel.description: Recent content in Key on Data and Open Source

item.title: How to create a JSON object from array of key/value pairs in PostgreSQL速?
item.description: PostgreSQL速 offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the function json_object (jsonb_object for JSONB) to create a JSON object from an array of key/value pairs.

item.title: How to create a JSON object from keys and values arrays in PostgreSQL速?
item.description: PostgreSQL速 offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the function json_object (jsonb_object for JSONB) to create a JSON object from two arrays of keys and values.
